txt.en: 'You have done Gondor a great service today, [placeholder]. The lordship of Pelargir has survived its greatest challenge, and we are now ready for what is next.\n\n'Please inform the Lord-Regent that we located his family, and that we have people tending to their injuries. I am sure that Faltharan would appreciate the news coming from you.'

Faltharan looks to you, and lets loose a relieved sigh.

'Very good. It pains me to know that my father is still missing, but I will try to carry on his legacy as best I can. The bloodline of Sirgon shall endure.

'We have tough days ahead of us, but no matter what, Pelargir will stand as a testament to Gondor's defiance in the face of war.'
Now that Faltharan's family is safe from the Corsairs, you have been asked personally to deliver the good news.
Faltharan is located at the steps to Tol Ciryarani.\n\nYou should speak with Faltharan.
